New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored the 2nd-fastest T20I hundred by an Indian batter, reaching the milestone in 45 balls
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav hit his 3rd hundred in T20Is, scoring 112 runs vs Sri Lanka in Rajkot
He was involved in a partnership of 113 runs along with Shubman Gill, who scored 46 off 36 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Cricket fraternity members like Wasim Jaffer, Ian Bishop, Kamran Akmal, Unmukt Chand, Aakash Chopra praised Suryakumar Yadav for his masterful knock against Sri Lanka
Miscellaneous Highlights: Suryakumar Yadav is one of the two Indian batters to score three or more hundreds in T20Is, alongside Rohit Sharma who has four hundreds
Others: The match was played in Rajkot, with Suryakumar Yadav debuting at the age of 30
